alphatown-index-header: A site to integrate maps with discord
alphatown-index-desc-process-1: Drop a marker near a location, add a title & image and share it with others.
alphatown-index-desc-process-2: All markers must be approved by a moderator before shown to other people.
alphatown-index-desc-supporting: Currently only supporting limited communities, ask if you feel like yours should be included
alphatown-genericerror: Something went wrong. Try again later.
alphatown-pinedit-title-update-approved: Update Pin (will make it pending again)
alphatown-pinedit-submit:
Your Pin is now Pending.
Once approved by an admin, it'll be public. You can update it if you want until then.
alphatown-pinedit-title-long: Your title is too long. 80 chars max
alphatown-pinedit-desc-long: Your desc is too long. 160 chars max
alphatown-pinedit-image-none: You must select an image to be associated with your pin
alphatown-pinedit-image-large: You must select an image smaller than 9 MB
alphatown-pinedit-location-addresswarn:
Do not select your actual address, pick a general place.
Click to drop marker
alphatown-pinedit-location-none: You must select a location for your pin
